content: Count Tamás met with Duke Kálmán and expressed his pleasure in meeting him. The duke shared his concerns about a conspiracy against him and asked Count Tamás for his help. Count Tamás assured the duke of his loyalty and willingness to serve him, promising to use his network of informants and investigative skills to uncover those involved in the treachery. He emphasized the importance of the duke's safety and well-being, and pledged to report back to him with his findings. Count Tamás took on the responsibility to root out the traitors and work with the duke to ensure his safety.

During the evening, Duke Kálmán approached Count Tamás seeking his help. Count Tamás, being a loyal vassal and knight, expressed his readiness to serve the Duke and inquired about the matter troubling him. In response, Duke Kálmán expressed his need for assistance, without providing further details in the conversation provided.

In the conversation between Count Tamás and Duke Kálmán, Count Tamás offers his support to the Duke, who voices his suspicion about people conspiring against him. Count Tamás, showing determination and loyalty, accepts the task of uncovering the traitors by utilizing his network of spies and informants to gather information discreetly. He advises the Duke to be vigilant and trust fewer people with sensitive information as he begins his investigations immediately and will report back with any findings.
